name: SchoolRumble
description: "School Rumble" is a light real-time battle game in a fashion of cuteness. During play, players have control over characters to fight with each other. Players can win the battle by quick reaction and smart decisions, even to turnaround the game in the last minute. Pair up with your friends face to face for a decent fight. Simple game operation with Immersive gameplay guarantees you a fresh and fun experience.
